name: Job Nexus - A Full Stack Job Portal App
description: A full-stack job portal built with Flutter and FastAPI, featuring secure authentication, role-based access, job posting, applications, and real-time chat powered by WebSockets.
longDescription: A full-stack job portal platform that connects recruiters and candidates. Features include secure authentication, role-based dashboards, job posting and application workflows, real-time chat, and admin moderation tools.

name: TuneStream - A Music Streaming App
description: A full-stack music streaming application inspired by Spotify, built with FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and Flutter.
longDescription: A music streaming platform that allows users to browse, stream, and manage playlists. Includes user authentication, audio streaming, recommendations, and admin content management.

name: TikTok Clone
description: A full-stack social video sharing application inspired by TikTok, built with Flutter and Firebase.
longDescription: A mobile-first social media application for uploading, sharing, and discovering short-form videos. Includes real-time feeds, likes, comments, and push notifications.

name: SmartCanteen - Canteen Management System
description: A web-based canteen management system for handling orders, menus, payments, and inventory.
longDescription: A full-stack canteen management platform designed for colleges and offices. Features include digital menus, order placement, real-time order tracking, inventory management, and admin analytics.

name: CircleEd - Skill Swap & Learning Platform
description: A peer-to-peer skill exchange and learning platform where users can teach and learn from each other.
longDescription: CircleEd enables users to offer skills, request mentorship, schedule sessions, and exchange knowledge. Includes profiles, messaging, reviews, scheduling, and admin moderation.

name: LifeDrop - Blood Donation & Request Platform
description: A platform that connects blood donors with patients and hospitals in real time.
longDescription: A life-saving web platform that allows users to register as donors, submit blood requests, receive emergency notifications, and locate nearby donors and hospitals using geo-location.
